document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Although open hERG1 channels did not interact as strongly with β1 integrins as did closed channels, current flow through hERG1 channels was necessary to activate the integrin-dependent phosphorylation of Tyr397 in focal adhesion kinase (transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway) in both normal and cancer cells.">
<sentence id="s2" text="In immunodeficient apoptotic process, proliferation was inhibited in breast cancer cells expressing forms of hERG1 with impaired K+ flow, whereas metastasis of breast cancer cells was reduced when the hERG1/β1 integrin interaction was disrupted.">
